reviews.text: A very nicely designed building. Good infrastructure. Plenty of place for your coats and stuff. Good audience but kinda small. Pretty steep sitting angle. Overall a great place for a concert.

Excellent venue with amazing acoustic. I was in back row of the 4th balcony but had not problem with sound quality. The top floor bar is also amazing for an interval drink. Beautiful views in amazing architecture

Nice embiance. Even the less expensive spots on the forth balcony were good. There is a free coat check on the fourth floor. And there is the opportunity to visit the roof in the breaks to catch a bit of fresh air.
This is a super cool and modern building with the finest amenities. The shows here are great and it's very well situated right next to the ferry terminal and the train station.
It was astonishing! Friendly and helpfull staff. Also a plus for the architecture. Perfect to feel fancy for an evening;

This is such a fun museum that it’s hard to leave. Every kind of transportation is represented. Many exhibits that brought back fond memories of favorite cars and times when things were so different. I enjoyed seeing the many Interactive exhibits for kids. Uh and adults :) I would go back to see it again. Don’t miss it!!
Liked it a lot. Its great for small kids and adults alike. Half a day won't get you through the entire exhibition if you're planning to take time to actually look at things.

Very comprehensive museum with lots of interactive exhibits. Good for all ages with information on history for adults and many hands on activities for kids. They even have a miniature operational boat navigation lock.

Excellent place for children and auto enthusiasts. It has got a planetarium, movie theater and chocolate museum in addition. If you want to enjoy with your children, keep a full day for it and it is worth every penny.
Awesome place to spend a day with (or without 😉) your kids. We go there at least once a month. Our son loves it. Trains, plains, cars, cable cabins, ships, space...

This is such a fun museum that it’s hard to leave. Every kind of transportation is represented. Many exhibits that brought back fond memories of favorite cars and times when things were so different. I enjoyed seeing the many Interactive exhibits for kids. Uh and adults :) I would go back to see it again. Don’t miss it!!
Liked it a lot. Its great for small kids and adults alike. Half a day won't get you through the entire exhibition if you're planning to take time to actually look at things.

Very comprehensive museum with lots of interactive exhibits. Good for all ages with information on history for adults and many hands on activities for kids. They even have a miniature operational boat navigation lock.

Excellent place for children and auto enthusiasts. It has got a planetarium, movie theater and chocolate museum in addition. If you want to enjoy with your children, keep a full day for it and it is worth every penny.
Awesome place to spend a day with (or without 😉) your kids. We go there at least once a month. Our son loves it. Trains, plains, cars, cable cabins, ships, space...

This museum was amazing. Being from Chicago it was nice to see a familiar artist, but this was over the top. Various rare art as well as personal photographs depicting the life of Picasso and his relationship with the Rosengart family. Also great Paul Klee exhibit in the basement presented in chronological order which was unique. No pictures allowed!
A great collection of Picasso, including some from the late period of his life. Also photographs of him in his studio. A few impressionist pictures and some by Leger and Klee.
Loved this place! Picasso’s work its amazing. 17€ ticket, totally worth it!
Great art gallery, lots of famous Picasso paintings! Staff is also very friendly.
Interesting Picasso collection - paintings, sketches and photos of the artist at work, Chagall, etc. Perfect size to do in a couple of hours without being overwhelmed
A very nicely designed building. Good infrastructure. Plenty of place for your coats and stuff. Good audience but kinda small. Pretty steep sitting angle. Overall a great place for a concert.

Excellent venue with amazing acoustic. I was in back row of the 4th balcony but had not problem with sound quality. The top floor bar is also amazing for an interval drink. Beautiful views in amazing architecture

Nice embiance. Even the less expensive spots on the forth balcony were good. There is a free coat check on the fourth floor. And there is the opportunity to visit the roof in the breaks to catch a bit of fresh air.
This is a super cool and modern building with the finest amenities. The shows here are great and it's very well situated right next to the ferry terminal and the train station.
It was astonishing! Friendly and helpfull staff. Also a plus for the architecture. Perfect to feel fancy for an evening;
A really nice and cosy place to meet your friends,have a date or just get some work done. Very friendly service.
Love this local spot. I come here regularly for breakfast and dinner. Great vibe for a nice meal or even to chill and work. The only place in Switzerland where I can find endless refills of coffee. ☕
Great place for grabbing a drink. Very crowded usually.
Very good organised. Good food and very friendly staf
Great food, atmosphere, service ans staff! I ordered the lentil dahl and it was delicious!
Nice ambience, smoking bar , live 🎹 session is awesome. Should try the food. It's really delicious . The foie gras , snails, and 🍷 .. loved the time spent there with my husband ..
The food is amazing (try the Entrecôte), big portions. This time the service was also good.
Excellent food and friendly service! Try the fish soup - it‘s amazing!
Very nice brasserie in the luzern city center...book a table and enjoy!
Good atmosphere, restaurant has definitely been here a while, but between the three of us we didn't have a single dish that we really liked, expect much more from a restaurant of this caliber.
Good.
Hostel ini sudah tutup. Entah diperbaiki atau tutup untuk selamanya.
非常棒的青旅!
